special_text:
[i]“...with a cry of “I am yours,” he leapt through the open window...”
–Statement of Herbert Knox[/i]
Look at the top eight cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Create a Living Lightning token. [i](It's a {3}{R} 3/2 Elemental Shaman creature with “When this creature dies, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.”)[/i]
You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
